MEME_RULES - Enum constant in enum class Controller.GameChoiceController.GameMode
 
MemeRules - Class in Model.Rules
This class specializes UnoGameRules to provide the methods of a game mode of UNO created by us Uno meme rules are : Setup -the number of cards that can be played in a single turn 3 -the number of cards distributed to each player at the start 11 -the cards with which a deck is composed by classic deck composition with 2 more skip,2 more draw2 ,2 more reverse for each color, 4 more wild and 4 more wild_draw4.
MemeRules() - Constructor for class Model.Rules.MemeRules
Creates a new MemeRules with the eleven cards per player at the start and three cards playable per turn,
while the deck has 2 more skip,2 more draw2 ,2 more reverse for each color, 4 more wild and 4 more wild_draw4.
